SummaryEnglish:
His magic comes from his horns. He can travel in time -- to the future and back to the past. He is Super Buffalo -- from same planet as Magic Eye, The Wonder Boy and Magic Tiger. Curious about Magic Eye's favourite food, ice cream, he follows him unnoticed to Earth where he tastes but does not like ice cream -- he complains it is too cold! But he refuses to go home.
He befriends the Wonder Boy's friends and he likes to show off he is better at magic and more helpful than the Boy. But he is too eager to please and help such that he gets into trouble!
